org.hibernate.validator.internal.xml

类 NamespaceNormalizingXMLEventReaderDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.xml.stream.util.EventReaderDelegate
      • org.hibernate.validator.internal.xml.NamespaceNormalizingXMLEventReaderDelegate
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Iterator, XMLEventReader

    public class NamespaceNormalizingXMLEventReaderDelegate
extends EventReaderDelegate
    An XML EventReaderDelegate designed to normalize the XML namespaces.

    From BV 1.x to BV 2, we changed the namespaces and we need to normalize the namespaces to the ones of BV 2 so that the unmarshaller can do its job.

    Note: it used to work in JDK 1.8 before the 102 release but the JDK is now stricter: https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8134111.
